page.title: 12EDUCATION. LAW & ORDER
page.content:
EDUCATION, PRIMARY. {Berkswell C/E Primary}educates children between 4 & 11yrs. of age. The original building was erected in the 19th century & is still in use. In June 1985 there are 117 children in 4 classes, 4 teachers & 1 Headteacher.
Berkswell has its own{police constable living in the Police House.The most common crime is burglary, the most serious, aggravated burglary. Because of the high class properties burglars come from great distances to commit their crimes.Older teenagers like riding their motor bikes around the village which disturbs & upsets the residents.The P.C.patrols his area on a motor-bike. His duties include dealing with road traffic accidents & handing out summons.
